title: The Return of Colin Mochrie
description: Tuesday, April 1st at 7:30pm PG – Some material may not be suitable for some audiences. Get ready for some mischievous fun in our special April Fools Day edition! YOU have the power to make things even trickier for our performers. Decide just how much chaos you want to stir up by drawing cards, shouting suggestions, and writing inspirations! It’s your chance to put our performers in all sorts of delightful trouble – and they’ll have to play along no matter what!

title: My Funny Valentine’s Day Show
description: Friday, February 14th at 7:30pm & 9:30pm 14A – May include suggestive language and/or scenes. It’s time for flirtation and fun, sappy songs and smooches, and -of course – love and laughter! Bring your sweety or your best bud and help guide our performers into the sweet and spicy scenarios you want to see most!

title: Hot Snack Comedy Presents: FEAST
description: Thursday, December 19th at 9:30pm 14A – May include suggestive language and/or scenes. Hot Snack invites you to the totally improvised holiday event of the season! The punchbowl’s 80% rum, the food’s overcooked, and there aren’t enough coat hooks. Someone just claimed to have changed your diapers, though you’ve never seen them. Join us for a night of hilarious conversations, quirky relationships, and holiday chaos. Expect gifts, snacks, and unsolicited advice—but no stress, because it’s not your family or coworkers!
